magpie.data.utilities.filters

Class CompositionSetDistanceFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.data.utilities.filters.BaseDatasetFilter
      • magpie.data.utilities.filters.CompositionSetDistanceFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Options

    public class CompositionSetDistanceFilter
extends BaseDatasetFilter
    Filter based on whether the distance of a composition from any other composition in a dataset is past a threshold. The distance between two compositions is based on the Lp norm of the difference in element fractions. The distance between a composition and the set is defined as the minimum distance between a composition and any entry in the dataset.

    Entries are labeled based on whether they are farther than a certain threshold.

    Usage: $<dataset> <norm> <threshold>
    dataset: CompositionDataset containing all compositions being considered
    norm: Which p norm to use when computing distances. Use -1 for the Linf norm.
    threshold: Distance threshold

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • computeDistance

        public static double computeDistance(java.util.Collection<CompositionEntry> set,
                     CompositionEntry entry,
                     int p)
        Compute the distance between a composition and a set of other compositions. Distance from the set is defined as the minimum distance from any points. Distance between two compositions is defined in computeDistance(magpie.data.materials.CompositionEntry, magpie.data.materials.CompositionEntry, int)
        Parameters:
        set - Set of compositions to consider
        entry - Composition of entry
        p - Desired Lp norm. Use -1 for Linf
        Returns:
        Distance from set
